memories.content: Initial commit: Estimate professional peer review platform
Add Logo component with local images and update header spacing
Update favicons and meta tags with Estimate branding
Add Estimate favicon files for all devices
Fix favicon paths - remove spaces from folder names
Major UX improvements based on CPO/Senior UX analysis
Add _redirects file for SPA routing in production
Replace Stress Management with Creativity & Innovation in review questions
Add comprehensive legal pages - TOS, Privacy Policy, and Disclaimer
Update Privacy Policy with comprehensive GDPR-compliant content
Implement real LinkedIn OAuth authentication
Add secure backend and remove client secret from frontend
Add secure backend and remove client secret from frontend
Add Cloudflare Turnstile invisible bot protection
Add vercel.json for SPA routing - Fix 404 on OAuth callback
Add Cloudflare protection badge to login page
Fix CORS to allow both www and non-www domains
Security fix and UX improvements
Add Cloud SQL integration and colleague search API
Add endpoint to detect server outbound IP
Add Cloud SQL Connector for secure private connection
Fix async pool initialization - await initializePool() calls
Fix remaining async pool initialization calls
Parse service account JSON from env var for Cloud SQL Connector
Write service account to temp file for Cloud SQL Connector
Revert "Add Cloud SQL Connector for secure private connection"
Revert "Fix async pool initialization - await initializePool() calls"
Revert "Fix remaining async pool initialization calls"
Revert "Parse service account JSON from env var for Cloud SQL Connector"
Revert "Write service account to temp file for Cloud SQL Connector"
Add profile matching fields to users table
Fix schema alignment with Bright Data: VARCHAR years, add skills table
Add migration script and admin endpoint to run migration
Add migration endpoint directly to server.js
Add table info endpoint
Fix migration: add ENGINE and CHARSET to match existing tables
Add table-info endpoint and fix migration
Add Core APIs: session/start, colleague/next, colleague/skip, review/submit, score/me
Add endpoint to get profile work history and colleagues from all companies
Limit colleague matching to current + 1 previous company only
Add 3+ months time overlap filter for colleague matching, remove connections-based sorting
Add performance indexes for colleague matching queries
Update OAuth callback to create user, match to Bright Data profile, and enable review flow
Update frontend to use real APIs for review flow
Fix OAuth matching: extract profile_id from LinkedIn URL, fallback to linkedin_num_id and name
Fix Profile page to use real LinkedIn OAuth user data instead of mock data
Add detailed OAuth logging to debug profile matching
Implement image matching: extract image ID from LinkedIn OAuth picture and match to Bright Data avatar URLs
Add endpoint to fix profile_match_method ENUM to support image matching
Register admin routes in server.js
Fix getPool reference in admin routes
Add profile picture to Onboarding page and skip counter to Insufficient Interaction button
Fix refresh bypass: return pending assignment if exists, move review counter to side, add profile pictures
Revert review counter to original position with dots on right side
Fix refresh bypass: create assignment with 'pending' status immediately when colleague is shown
Fix refresh bypass: add pending status to assignments and skip Turnstile in local dev
Add loading state to skip button and fix counter jumping issue
Update Onboarding: wider card, user name greeting, bigger anonymous icon, replace all arrows with new design
Add new images: anonymous icon and right arrow
Fix colleague query to prioritize current and most recent shared companies
Add daily skip budget refresh: sessions expire after 24 hours, button shows 'Try again tomorrow' when skips exhausted
Add abuse detection: block users who exhaust skips 3 days in a row, cap max skips at 3/day, add Blocked page with contact form
Fix skip budget: company-size-based (3-13 max), +3 daily refresh only when exhausted
Fix database column name: use started_at instead of created_at for review_sessions
Enforce blocking: redirect blocked users to Blocked page immediately, prevent access to other pages
Add score fetching from backend API to display user reviews and scores on Profile page
Clean up Profile page: remove clock icon, hide Reviews Received when 0, remove duplicate button
Fix mobile OAuth CSRF error: switch from sessionStorage to localStorage with 10min expiration
Improve colleague matching: better handling for duration-only profiles (assume 24mo overlap for current employees)
Add skip tracking: profiles get 2nd chance after 1st skip, excluded after 2nd skip (per user)
Fix: Remove is_blocked column reference (not in schema yet)
Restore is_blocked abuse detection + Add migration
Fix mobile OAuth: Use sessionStorage + localStorage fallback
Optimize mobile OAuth + Add user-facing message
Fix: Match interaction types to database ENUM values
Add backend mapping for old frontend values + Fix user_id null error
Fix: Handle reviewees without user accounts in score updates
Add comprehensive data field audit documentation
Add dynamic typewriter hero titles with animation
Update FAQ: Accurate 3-review unlock mechanism for recruiter visibility
Fix mobile OAuth slowness: Implement lazy loading for all pages
Fix mobile OAuth: Make Cloudflare Turnstile verification visible
Show actual Cloudflare Turnstile widget with logo and loading
Fix Turnstile container not found error
Fix: Use ref callback to render Turnstile when element is mounted
Improve navigation and profile visibility
Fix: Change review session status from 'expired' to 'abandoned' to match ENUM values
Add relationship-specific review questions with weighted scoring
Fix validation: remove old column references, validate new scores structure
Improve clarity of 'Handles Disagreements' question - rename to 'Conflict Resolution'
Add /api/analytics/users endpoint for detailed user review activity table
Add randomization and prioritize colleagues with 1-2 reviews for completion
Add AI grammar polish feature with OpenAI integration
Fix Polish button: move below textarea and use production API URL
Add Netlify config to fix SPA routing and MIME type issues
Remove netlify.toml - using Vercel for frontend
Fix polish-comment route path to match frontend API call
Upgrade to GPT-4o-mini for better grammar correction with lower temperature
Simplify profile page: compact hero section with Continue Reviewing button, fix onboarding redirect for users who completed 3 reviews
Profile page redesign: percentile tiers, mobile responsiveness, consent modal update
Add new relationship-specific soft skills to review config
Fix job title normalization for percentile badge
Improve mobile UI: logo icon and score circle
Improve review form UI: wider layout, better organization, moved content up
Improve tag button alignment: left-align text and icons
Add comprehensive abuse detection system
Add escalating violation warnings with 24-hour lockout
Add clean badge preview to profile headline
Update logo to light version
Update to new light logo version
Fix: Replace insecure client-side fraud detection with server-side enforcement
Smart colleague matching: expand to 4 companies with 2-year filter, skip companies with no colleagues, add 70/30 current/previous weighting
Update PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: document colleague matching improvements and fraud detection changes
feat: Implement anonymous review system with token-burning architecture
feat: Add 'Can't rate this' skip feature with 30% limit + fix review counter bug
feat: Complete review counter fix + UI improvements
feat: Add email notifications for new reviews
fix: Correct 70/30 company distribution in colleague matching
feat: Add sitemap.xml and robots.txt for SEO
feat: Add sitemap.xml and robots.txt for SEO
fix: Serve sitemap.xml and robots.txt as static files
fix: Add sitemap.xml and robots.txt content
feat: Add Google Tag Manager tracking
